notify.name: SystemMessageTip
notify.message: [MESSAGE]

notify.name: Cancelled
notify.message: Cancelled

notify.name: CancelledSit
notify.message: Cancelled Sit

notify.name: CancelledAttach
notify.message: Cancelled Attach

notify.name: ReplacedMissingWearable
notify.message: Replaced missing clothing/body part with default.

notify.name: FriendOnline
notify.message: [FIRST] [LAST] is Online

notify.name: FriendOffline
notify.message: [FIRST] [LAST] is Offline

notify.name: AddSelfFriend
notify.message: You cannot add yourself as a friend.

notify.name: UploadingAuctionSnapshot
notify.message: Uploading in-world and web site snapshots... (Takes about 5 minutes.)

notify.name: UploadPayment
notify.message: You paid L$[AMOUNT] to upload.

notify.name: UploadingSnapshot
notify.message: Uploading in-world snapshot... (Takes a minute or so.)

notify.name: UploadWebSnapshotDone
notify.message: Web site snapshot upload done.

notify.name: UploadSnapshotDone
notify.message: In-world snapshot upload done

notify.name: TerrainDownloaded
notify.message: Terrain.raw downloaded

notify.name: InMaxGroups
notify.message: You are already in the maximum number of groups. You will need to leave a group before you can create one.

notify.name: GestureMissing
notify.message: Gesture [NAME] is missing from database.

notify.name: UnableToLoadGesture
notify.message: Unable to load gesture [NAME]. Please try again.

notify.name: InventoryLoaded
notify.message: Your inventory is loaded.

notify.name: LandmarkMissing
notify.message: Landmark is missing from database.

notify.name: UnableToLoadLandmark
notify.message: Unable to load landmark. Please try again.

notify.name: CapsKeyOn
notify.message: Your Caps Lock key is on. As this will affect the password you type in, you will probably want to turn it off.

notify.name: NotecardMissing
notify.message: Notecard is missing from database.

notify.name: NotecardNoPermissions
notify.message: Insufficient permissions to view notecard.

notify.name: RezItemNoPermissions
notify.message: Insufficient permissions to rez object.

notify.name: UnableToLoadNotecard
notify.message: Unable to load notecard. Please try again.

notify.name: ScriptMissing
notify.message: Script is missing from database.

notify.name: ScriptNoPermissions
notify.message: Insufficient permissions to view script.

notify.name: UnableToLoadScript
notify.message: Unable to load script. Please try again.

notify.name: IncompleteInventory
notify.message: The complete contents you are offering are not yet locally available. Please try offering those items again in a minute.

notify.name: CannotModifyProtectedCategories
notify.message: You cannot modify protected categories.

notify.name: CannotRemoveProtectedCategories
notify.message: You cannot remove protected categories.

notify.name: OfferedCard
notify.message: You have offered a calling card to [FIRST] [LAST]

notify.name: UnableToBuyWhileDownloading
notify.message: Unable to buy while downloading object data. Please try again.

notify.name: UnableToLinkWhileDownloading
notify.message: Unable to link while downloading object data. Please try again.

notify.name: CannotBuyObjectsFromDifferentOwners
notify.message: Cannot buy objects from different owners at the same time. Please select a single object.

notify.name: ObjectNotForSale
notify.message: Object does not appear to be for sale.

notify.name: EnteringGodMode
notify.message: Entering god mode, level [LEVEL]

notify.name: LeavingGodMode
notify.message: Leaving god mode, level [LEVEL]

notify.name: CopyFailed
notify.message: Copy failed because you lack copy permission

notify.name: InventoryAccepted
notify.message: [NAME] accepted your inventory offer.

notify.name: InventoryDeclined
notify.message: [NAME] declined your inventory offer.

notify.name: ObjectMessage
notify.message: [NAME]: [MESSAGE]

notify.name: CallingCardAccepted
notify.message: Your calling card was accepted.

notify.name: CallingCardDeclined
notify.message: Your calling card was declined.

notify.name: TeleportToLandmark
notify.message: Now that you have reached the mainland, you can teleport to locations like '[NAME]' by clicking on the Inventory button on the bottom right of your screen, and then select the Landmarks folder. Double click on the landmark and click on Teleport to travel there.

notify.name: TeleportToPerson
notify.message: Now that you have reached the mainland, you can contact residents like '[NAME]' by clicking on the Inventory button on the bottom right of your screen, and then select the Calling Cards folder. Double click on the card, click on Instant Message, and type a message.

notify.name: CantSelectLandFromMultipleRegions
notify.message: Can't select land across server boundaries. Try selecting a smaller piece of land.

notify.name: GenerticNotify
notify.message: [MESSAGE]

notify.name: SearchWordBanned
notify.message: Some terms in your search query were excluded due to content restrictions as clarified in the Community Standards.

notify.name: NoContentToSearch
notify.message: Please select at least one type of content to search (PG, Mature, or Adult).

notify.name: GroupVote
notify.message: [NAME] has proposed to vote on: [MESSAGE]

notify.name: GroupElection
notify.message: [NAME] has started an election: [MESSAGE]

notify.name: SystemMessage
notify.message: [MESSAGE]

notify.name: EventNotification
notify.message:
Event Notification:
[NAME] [DATE]

notify.name: TransferObjectsHighlighted
notify.message:
All objects on this parcel that will transfer to the purchaser of this parcel are now highlighted.
* Trees and grasses that will transfer are not highlighted.

notify.name: DeactivatedGesturesTrigger
notify.message: Deactivated gestures with same trigger: [NAMES]

notify.name: InventoryNetworkCorruption
notify.message: Inventory could not be loaded because of network corruption. This indicates a bad network connection.

notify.name: NoQuickTime
notify.message: Apple's QuickTime software does not appear to be installed on your system. If you want to view streaming media on parcels that support it you should go to the QuickTime site (http://www.apple.com/quicktime) and install the QuickTime Player.

notify.name: OwnedObjectsReturned
notify.message: The objects you own on the selected parcel of land have been returned back to your inventory.

notify.name: OtherObjectsReturned
notify.message: The objects on the selected parcel of land that is owned by [FIRST] [LAST] have been returned to his or her inventory.

notify.name: OtherObjectsReturned2
notify.message: The objects on the selected parcel of land owned by the resident '[NAME]' have been returned to their owner.

notify.name: GroupObjectsReturned
notify.message: The objects on the selected parcel of land shared with the group [GROUPNAME] have been returned back to their owner's inventory. Transferable deeded objects have been returned to their previous owners. Non-transferable objects that are deeded to the group have been deleted.

notify.name: UnOwnedObjectsReturned
notify.message: The objects on the selected parcel that are NOT owned by you have been returned to their owners.

notify.name: NotSafe
notify.message: This land has damage enabled ('not safe'). You can be hurt here. If you die, you will be teleported to your home location.

notify.name: NoFly
notify.message: This land has flying disabled ('no fly'). You cannot fly here.

notify.name: PushRestricted
notify.message: This land is 'No Pushing'. You cannot push others here unless you own the land.

notify.name: NoVoice
notify.message: This land has voice disabled.

notify.name: NoBuild
notify.message: This land has building disabled ('no build'). You cannot create objects here.

notify.name: ScriptsStopped
notify.message: An administrator has temporarily stopped scripts in this region.

notify.name: ScriptsNotRunning
notify.message: This region is not running any scripts.

notify.name: NoOutsideScripts
notify.message: This land has outside scripts disabled ('no outside scripts'). No scripts will run except those belonging to the land owner.

notify.name: ApproveURL
notify.message: An object wants to display this web page on its surface: [URL]

notify.name: ClaimPublicLand
notify.message: Can only claim public land in region you're in.

notify.name: ObjectGiveItem
notify.message: An object named [OBJECTFROMNAME] owned by [FIRST] [LAST] has given you a [OBJECTTYPE] named [OBJECTNAME].

notify.name: ObjectGiveItemUnknownUser
notify.message: An object named [OBJECTFROMNAME] owned by (an unknown user) has given you a [OBJECTTYPE] named [OBJECTNAME].

notify.name: UserGiveItem
notify.message: [NAME] has given you a [OBJECTTYPE] named '[OBJECTNAME]'.

notify.name: GodMessage
notify.message: [NAME] [MESSAGE]

notify.name: JoinGroup
notify.message: [MESSAGE]

notify.name: JoinGroupOfficerNoFee
notify.message:
[NAME] has invited you to join a group as an officer. There is no cost to join this group.
[MESSAGE]

notify.name: JoinGroupMember
notify.message:
[NAME] has invited you to join a group as a member. To join this group, you will have to pay a signup fee of L$[COST]
[MESSAGE]

notify.name: JoinGroupMemberNoFee
notify.message:
[NAME] has invited you to join a group as a member. There is no cost to join this group.
[MESSAGE]

notify.name: OfferTeleport
notify.message:
[NAME] has offered to teleport you to his or her location:
[MESSAGE]

notify.name: GotoURL
notify.message: [MESSAGE] [URL]

notify.name: OfferFriendship
notify.message:
[NAME] is offering friendship.
[MESSAGE]
(By default, you will be able to see each other's online status.)

notify.name: OfferFriendshipNoMessage
notify.message:
[NAME] is offering friendship.
(By default, you will be able to see each other's online status.)

notify.name: FriendshipAccepted
notify.message: [NAME] accepted your friendship offer.

notify.name: FriendshipDeclined
notify.message: [NAME] declined your friendship offer.

notify.name: OfferCallingCard
notify.message: [FIRST] [LAST] is offering their calling card. This will add a bookmark in your inventory so you can quickly IM this resident.

notify.name: RegionRestartMinutes
notify.message: Region is restarting in [MINUTES] minutes. If you remain in this region you will be logged out.

notify.name: RegionRestartSeconds
notify.message: Region is restarting in [SECONDS] seconds. If you remain in this region you will be logged out.

notify.name: LoadWebPage
notify.message:
Load web page [URL]?
[MESSAGE]
From object: [OBJECTNAME], owner: [NAME]?

notify.name: FailedToLoadWearableUnnamed
notify.message:
Oops! You tried to wear a [TYPE] and it did not load.
Don't panic. Try again in a minute to give things a chance to settle down.

notify.name: FailedToLoadWearable
notify.message:
Oops! You tried to wear [TYPE] named [DESC] and it did not load.
Don't panic. Try again in a minute to give things a chance to settle down.

notify.name: FailedToFindWearableUnnamed
notify.message: Failed to find [TYPE] in database.

notify.name: FailedToFindWearable
notify.message: Failed to find [TYPE] named [DESC] in database.

notify.name: ScriptTakeMoney
notify.message: Take Linden dollars (L$) from you

notify.name: ActOnControlInputs
notify.message: Act on your control inputs

notify.name: RemapControlInputs
notify.message: Remap your control inputs

notify.name: AnimateYourAvatar
notify.message: Animate your avatar

notify.name: AttachToYourAvatar
notify.message: Attach to your avatar

notify.name: ReleaseOwnership
notify.message: Release ownership and become public

notify.name: LinkAndDelink
notify.message: Link and delink from other objects

notify.name: AddAndRemoveJoints
notify.message: Add and remove joints with other objects

notify.name: ChangePermissions
notify.message: Change its permissions

notify.name: TrackYourCamera
notify.message: Track your camera

notify.name: ControlYourCamera
notify.message: Control your camera

notify.name: ScriptQuestion
notify.message:
'[OBJECTNAME]', an object owned by '[NAME]', would like to:
[QUESTIONS] Is this OK?

notify.name: ScriptQuestionCautionChatGranted
notify.message: '[OBJECTNAME]', an object owned by '[OWNERNAME]', located in [REGIONNAME] at [REGIONPOS], has been granted permission to: [PERMISSIONS].

notify.name: ScriptQuestionCautionChatDenied
notify.message: '[OBJECTNAME]', an object owned by '[OWNERNAME]', located in [REGIONNAME] at [REGIONPOS], has been denied permission to: [PERMISSIONS].

notify.name: ScriptQuestionCautionWarn
notify.message: An object wants permission to take Linden dollars (L$) from your account.

notify.name: ScriptQuestionCaution
notify.message:
'[OBJECTNAME]', an object owned by '[NAME]', would like to:
[QUESTIONS] If you do not trust this object and its creator, you should deny the request. For additional information, click the Details button.
Grant this request?

notify.name: ScriptDialog
notify.message: [FIRST] [LAST]'s '[TITLE]' [MESSAGE]

notify.name: ScriptDialogGroup
notify.message: [GROUPNAME]'s '[TITLE]' [MESSAGE]

notify.name: FirstBalanceIncrease
notify.message: You just received L$[AMOUNT]. Objects and other users may give you L$. Your balance is shown in the upper-right corner of the screen.

notify.name: FirstBalanceDecrease
notify.message: You just paid L$[AMOUNT]. Your balance is shown in the upper-right corner of the screen.

notify.name: FirstSit
notify.message: You are sitting. Use the arrow keys (or AWSD) to change the view. Click the 'Stand Up' button to get up.

notify.name: FirstMap
notify.message: Click and drag to scroll the map. Double-click to teleport. Use the controls on the right to find things and display different backgrounds.

notify.name: FirstBuild
notify.message: You can build new objects in some areas of [SECOND_LIFE]. Use the tools in the upper left to build, and try holding down Ctrl or Alt to rapidly switch tools. Press Esc to stop building.

notify.name: FirstLeftClickNoHit
notify.message: Left-clicking interacts with special objects. If the mouse pointer changes to a hand, you can interact with the object. Right-click always shows a menu of things you can do.

notify.name: FirstTeleport
notify.message: This region doesn't allow point-to-point teleports, so you've been transported to the nearest telehub. Your destination is marked with a tall beacon. Follow the red arrow to the beacon, or click the arrow to dismiss the beacon.

notify.name: FirstOverrideKeys
notify.message: Your movement keys are now being handled by an object. Try the arrow keys or AWSD to see what they do. Some objects (like guns) require you to go into mouselook to use them. Press 'M' to do this.

notify.name: FirstAppearance
notify.message: You are editing your appearance. To rotate and zoom view, use the arrow keys. When you are finished, press 'Save All' to save your look and exit. You can edit your appearance as often as you like.

notify.name: FirstInventory
notify.message: This is your inventory, which contains objects, notecards, clothing, and other things you own. * To wear an object or outfit folder, drag it onto yourself. * To bring an object into the world, drag it onto the ground. * To read a notecard, double-click it.

notify.name: FirstSandbox
notify.message:
This is a sandbox region. Objects you build here may be deleted after you leave the area, Sandboxes clean on a regular basis, please refer to the information at the top of the screen next to the region name.
Sandbox regions are uncommon, and are marked with signs.

notify.name: FirstFlexible
notify.message: This object is flexible. Flexible objects may not be physical and must be phantom until the flexible checkbox is unchecked.

notify.name: FirstDebugMenus
notify.message: You have enabled the Advanced menu. This menu contains features useful for developers debugging Second Life. To toggle this menu on Windows press Ctrl-Alt-D. On Mac press Cmd-Opt-Shift-D.

notify.name: FirstSculptedPrim
notify.message: You are editing a sculpted prim. Sculpted prims require a special texture to specify their shape. You can find example sculpted textures in the inventory library.

notify.name: FirstMedia
notify.message: You have begun playing media. Media can set to play automatically in the preferences window under Audio / Video. Note that this can be a security risk for media sites you do not trust.

notify.name: MaxListSelectMessage
notify.message: You may only select up to [MAX_SELECT] items from this list.

notify.name: VoiceInviteP2P
notify.message: [NAME] is inviting you to a Voice Chat call. Click Accept to join the call or Decline to decline the invitation. Click Mute to mute this caller.

notify.name: AutoUnmuteByIM
notify.message: [FIRST] [LAST] was sent an instant message and has been automatically unmuted.

notify.name: AutoUnmuteByMoney
notify.message: [FIRST] [LAST] was given money and has been automatically unmuted.

notify.name: AutoUnmuteByInventory
notify.message: [FIRST] [LAST] was offered inventory and has been automatically unmuted.

notify.name: VoiceInviteGroup
notify.message: [NAME] has joined a Voice Chat call with the group [GROUP]. Click Accept to join the call or Decline to decline the invitation. Click Mute to mute this caller.

notify.name: VoiceInviteAdHoc
notify.message: [NAME] has joined a Voice Chat call with a conference chat.. Click Accept to join the call or Decline to decline the invitation. Click Mute to mute this user.

notify.name: InviteAdHoc
notify.message: [NAME] is inviting you to a conference chat. Click Accept to join the chat or Decline to decline the invitation. Click Mute to mute this user.

notify.name: VoiceChannelFull
notify.message: The voice call you are trying to join, [VOICE_CHANNEL_NAME], has reached maximum capacity. Please try again later.

notify.name: ProximalVoiceChannelFull
notify.message: We're sorry. This area has reached maximum capacity for voice conversations. Please try to use voice in another area.

notify.name: VoiceChannelDisconnected
notify.message: You have been disconnected from [VOICE_CHANNEL_NAME]. You will now be reconnected to spatial voice chat.

notify.name: VoiceChannelDisconnectedP2P
notify.message: [VOICE_CHANNEL_NAME] has ended the call. You will now be reconnected to spatial voice chat.

notify.name: P2PCallDeclined
notify.message: [VOICE_CHANNEL_NAME] has declined your call. You will now be reconnected to spatial voice chat.

notify.name: P2PCallNoAnswer
notify.message: [VOICE_CHANNEL_NAME] is not available to take your call. You will now be reconnected to spatial voice chat.

notify.name: VoiceChannelJoinFailed
notify.message: Failed to connect to [VOICE_CHANNEL_NAME], please try again later. You will now be reconnected to spatial voice chat.

notify.name: VoiceLoginRetry
notify.message: We are creating a voice channel for you. This may take up to one minute.

notify.name: Cannot enter parcel: not a group member
notify.message: Cannot enter parcel, you are not a member of the appropriate group.

notify.name: Cannot enter parcel: banned
notify.message: Cannot enter parcel, you have been banned.

notify.name: Cannot enter parcel: not on access list
notify.message: Cannot enter parcel, you are not on the access list.

notify.name: VoiceNotAllowed
notify.message: You do not have permission to connect to voice chat for [VOICE_CHANNEL_NAME].

notify.name: VoiceCallGenericError
notify.message: An error has occurred while trying to connect to voice chat for [VOICE_CHANNEL_NAME]. Please try again later.

notify.name: ServerVersionChanged
notify.message: The region you have entered is running a different simulator version. Current simulator : [NEWVERSION] Previous simulator: [OLDVERSION]

notify.name: UnableToOpenCommandURL
notify.message: The URL you clicked cannot be opened from this web browser.

notify.name: FirstAO
notify.message: For instructions, make a new template in the AO. Use the toolbar to toggle the AO on/off.

notify.name: MediaBlocked
notify.message: Media/audio URL blocked for DOMAIN.

notify.name: DisplayNameUpdate
notify.message: OLD_NAME (SLID) is now known as NEW_NAME.

notify.name: IncompleteInventoryItem
notify.message: The item you are accessing is not yet locally available. Please try again in a minute.

notify.name: ExportSuccessful
notify.message: Export successful.
